page.title: 18RESIDENTS' COMMENTS ON SHOPS
page.content: Order of importance following a survey 1 Bishops Waltham is a{well stocked} town which is{attractive}and is very {friendly.} 2 The town needs a{larger supermarket} but many people were concerned that it should not detract from the{ { village}character. 3{Parking fees}recently introduced are bad and cause danger by more parking in the High Street. A time limit on parking, perhaps a disc system,might be more advantageous. 4 The two main reasons for{out-of-town bulk buying are: it is cheaper and there are no parking fees at many supermarkets. 5 Some parents think we need a toy shop, a fabric shop, a hardware shop, a deep-freeze centre and a take-away food centre.
